website_summaries.verdict: A kids kayak with a few extra features.
pros: Finger handles molded into the sides to help your child with stability
cons: While the length is 6 feet, the sitting area is smaller, making this option too small for older kids to use

customer_reviews.title: A Great Option for Introducing Your Kids to Kayaking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak for my 8 year old son, so he could come with me on some short kayaking days. He took to it so quick! It tracks well and has a great balance for kids, so you don't need to worry about fishing them out of the lake or river. This is a great option for introducing your kids to kayaking!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the price. Grandsons BD gift and he loved it. Bonus seat and paddle make it a better deal. Slides right into the back of the van.
customer_reviews.author: PopRox

customer_reviews.title: Cheap flimsy paddles
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is perfect!! The paddles are cheap and way to short... which means my grandson has to lean from side to side. For the price we paid you’d think they would think they would at least include nice paddles instead of these cheap flimsy Ones that I am sure won’t last!! I would not recommend this kayak based on the paddles alone !! We got my our granddaughter a lifetime kayak and her paddles are 100% better and the whole set was cheaper but better built!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old and 5 year old girls love it and are able to maneuver very well. The paddle isn't as sturdy as I'd like, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great Kayak for kids. The handle did break on the very first day though. So that was a bummer. But the Kayak has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Judge

customer_reviews.title: Our 9 year old daughter got this for her birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old daughter got this for her birthday. She loves it. The paddle is a little flimsy and short, but works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Lett

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak for kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 year old grandson. He got on it as soon as it arrived and he was able to maneuver it great. He is able to handle it himself and even pointed out to me that it has a roller on the bottom that makes it easy to pull. I thought it was a bit pricey for something that they will grow out of but it has gradual foot steps so I think it’s something they can use for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The Kayak is perfect for kids 8 to 12
customer_reviews.text: The Kayak is perfect for kids 8 to 12. The paddle broke the first time my grandson used the kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 6year old. He was immediately able to figure it out paddle the kayak around and it tracked well. He was comfortable and loved the gift.
customer_reviews.author: luke hall

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome for my 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked awesome for my 6 yr old daughter. Paddle is a little flimsy. But it’s for a kid. So probably not for her strength
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kayak, buy a good paddle.
customer_reviews.text: The kayak itself is strong, but the paddle included is junk. That is the reason for 3 stars on sturdiness. The main reason I chose this more expencive oneis for the seat with adjustable back, which works good for my 10 yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ehlert

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak but paddle is too Short.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle is unusable. It is too short. I purchased this for my 4 year old and had to find another paddle. The boat design is great. I purchased because I wanted a seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for our 4 year old grandson. Handled well and easy for us to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Kayak = good, paddle = not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Kayak itself is great, my 8yo daughter loves it and can maneuver it very well. You'll probably want a different paddle though, the one that it comes with is just too small
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst purchases I ever made it doesn’t work... The paddle hardly reach the water.. I have several kayaks work well this was a very bad purchase and no way to return it
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but paddles are not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I think the paddles are a bit cheap. I will buy a different paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 6 year old. Seat adjusting takes a little bit of work to get just right, but no big problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: my 5 yearly grandson loves it and is leaning with this boat quit easily
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Decent but delicate
customer_reviews.text: The kayak itself is great for my 8 year old. The paddle broke the 2nd time out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Over all not bad for my 48" 50lb kid
customer_reviews.text: 2.5... Over all not bad for my 48" 50lb kid. The paddle is a complete joke though. It would not stay together and was way too short to reach the water without leaning over the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Some One

customer_reviews.title: just as important as the kayak which couldn't be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle broke on the first trip, just as important as the kayak which couldn't be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Riquelmer A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Paddle way too short!
customer_reviews.text: Nice first kayak for a child, but the paddle is worthless. Had bought my other 2 grandchild a very similar kayak and it came with 6 ft. Paddle which was perfect but I can't seem to find a 6 ft. Paddle sold separately to replace these little ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 6ft Kids Kayak with Paddle, Cushioned Backrest, Storage Compartment, Wheel
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN: Crafted with an open cockpit, molded-in footwells for security, and a front toggle handle with easy-role skeg wheel; a 2-fin paddle is also included for easy rowing
BUILT-IN STORAGE: Made with a cup and bottle holder, rear cargo storage compartment covered by net lacing, and front storage area with a bungee cord
COMFORTABLE BACKREST: Children will be able to tread waters in optimal comfort, as the kayak is built with a padded backrest that can be conveniently folded down
DURABLE COMPOSITION: Made of tough, UV-resistant plastic, it maintains its color and ensures years of use

EASY TRANSPORTATION: Take this lightweight kayak to the lake, beach, or river, as built-in side handles provide no on-the-go hassle; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 72"(L) x 26"(W) x 7"(Depth); Weight Capacity: 121 lbs.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
